refnamediv.refpurpose: Do an apple remove, remove metadata and resource fork as well

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: apple_rmapple_rm is a perl script that removes FILE(s) as well as the .AppleDouble metadata file(s) that corresponds to FILE(s). These AppleDouble header files eventually also contain the resource fork if the files had one. apple_rm does not delete directories.

refsect1.title: REPORTING BUGS
refsect1.para: Report bugs to the Netatalk-devel list <netatalk-devel@lists.sourceforge.net>.
